extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 3 and COMM311 or permission of the School of Business.

basic.description: This course is a continuation of COMM-311. Specifically, this course examines the theoretical underpinnings and accounting decision making related to such topics as long-term debt, pensions, leases, and accounting for income taxes. The course also introduces the topic of financial statement analysis.
basic.subject: COMM
basic.title: Financial Accounting II
